original_text: And they shall eat those things wherewith the atonement was made, to consecrate and to sanctify them: but a stranger shall not eat thereof, because they are holy.
korean_text: 그들은 속죄물 곧 그들을 위임하며 그들을 거룩하게 하는 데 쓰는 것을 먹되 타인은 먹지 못할지니 그것이 거룩하기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: And they shall eat those things
to consecrate and to sanctify them:
but a stranger shall not eat thereof,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이방인은 그것을 먹지 못할 것이며,
